name: Lime Drink
description: Key lime yogurt drink? This is a two flavor mix Alfred and I made up in a quick conversation. Not much to say other than SS is entirely necessary.
author: MaxSavage

reviews.text: Fantastic Juice Max! Been hearing you gloat on these flavors for a few weeks. Had to mix it up. WOW. Simple and super flavorful.  Lime blends great with the lime back notes in Yoghurt Drink.  Just refreshing and creamy. ADV Im thinking and this is on the shake which Im sure is fine.  Now we'll see if the lime stands up after a couple weeks.  THANKS!
Super simple and super tasty. Wife really enjoyed the room note this left. Excellent job
Really digging this, tastes great in a Citadel as well as my Caliburn (flavorings +50%).
Super good, super simple and refreshing two flavor banger. You can never go wrong with VT Shisha Lime and this recipe is a prime example of how great it is!
This is some serious good stuff. I was scared, that the lime would completely overtake everything, but it didn't. 6% Yoghurt drink might seem high, but it suits the lime so very well. Good stuff!
